caption: Relating to the purchase of or acquisition of title to real property by certain aliens or foreign entities; creating a criminal offense.
last_action: 03/14/2025 H Referred to Homeland Security, Public Safety & Veterans' Affairs: Mar 14 2025  2:42PM
summary: This bill prohibits individuals and entities from designated countries (China, Iran, North Korea, Russia) from purchasing or acquiring real property in Texas. Chinese citizens living in China cannot buy property, and violations result in property divestiture and criminal penalties. Chinese-Americans and permanent residents are exempt. Companies controlled by Chinese government or Chinese nationals are also prohibited from property purchases.
translation: 该法案禁止来自指定国家（中国、伊朗、朝鲜、俄罗斯）的个人和实体在德克萨斯州购买或获得不动产。居住在中国的中国公民不能购买房产，违反者将被剥夺财产并受到刑事处罚。美籍华人和永久居民不受影响。受中国政府或中国公民控制的公司也被禁止购买房产。
